ns0:Concept.displayName: INR in Blood by Coagulation assay
INR in Platelet poor plasma or blood by Coagulation assay
INR in Capillary blood by Coagulation assay
INR in Platelet poor plasma by Coagulation assay --post heparin adsorption
INR in Platelet poor plasma by Coagulation assay

ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains laboratory tests used to identify International Normalized Ratio (INR).),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify the laboratory test International Normalized Ratio (INR). Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to the Laboratory Test category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only include codes which represent a laboratory test of INR (International Normalized Ratio). These are LOINC codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.)
